brainly_data.question:
PLEASE HELP ME
Which is an example of irony?

A. A boy who is angry at his parent, slips into an alley to avoid his mother and runs right into his father.
B. A man challenges another man to a duel, but only one of the men shows up to the duel.
C. A woman predicts that the baby she's carrying will be a boy, but the baby turns out to be a girl.
D. A firefighter rushes into a blazing house to rescue a cat and barely survives the ordeal.
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
PLEASE HELP ME
Which is an example of irony?

A. A boy who is angry at his parent, slips into an alley to avoid his mother and runs right into his father.
B. A man challenges another man to a duel, but only one of the men shows up to the duel.
C. A woman predicts that the baby she's carrying will be a boy, but the baby turns out to be a girl.
D. A firefighter rushes into a blazing house to rescue a cat and barely survives the ordeal.
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: A since he is mad at his parents so he hides to avoid his mom (a parent) but runs into the other parent (dad).
